summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 10971 for the improvement of Northlake Avenue, from First Avenue Northeast to Tenth Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein under Ordinance No. 12496. and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon and providing for the collection of said assessment.
